timeline.message:
GEODE-8203: Adding standard-output-always-on 

Added information about a new system property that prevents disabling logging to standard out when a log file is present

timeline.bodyText: I thought the property was StandardOutputAlwaysOn (pascal case) according to #5183 ? Maybe I'm not understanding how it works.
timeline.author: aaronlindsey
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -756,6 +756,13 @@ When enabled, also sets ssl-endpoint-identification-enabled to true. JKS + +standard-output-always-on

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I missed #5197. Now it all makes sense!
replies.author: aaronlindsey
